ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( X1_a_Contract_Type__c , 'Business Associate (BAA)'), ISPICKVAL( X1_a_Contract_Type__c , 'Evaluation'), ISPICKVAL( X1_a_Contract_Type__c , 'Non-Disclosure (NDA)') ) , OR( ISNULL(TEXT(X3_New_Contract_or_Amendment_to_Existing__c)) , ISNULL(TEXT(X4_Starting_Form_Template__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: New Contract or Amendment to Existing and Starting Form Template cannot be blank for BAA, Evaluation or NDA
